wikipedia_page.main: Anthony John Mitchell (born 7 September 1956 in Redruth, Cornwall) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a right back.

response: *Tony Mitchell (basketball, born 1989), basketball player formerly of the University of Alabama
